   20: 
   21: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %% Purpose:
   23: %%
   24: %% Test:    ts:run(snmp, snmp_log_SUITE, [batch]).
   25: %% Test:    ts:run(snmp, snmp_log_SUITE, log_to_txt2, [batch]).
   26: %% 
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(snmp_log_SUITE).
   29: 
   30: 
   31: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: %% Include files
   33: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   35: -include("snmp_test_lib.hrl").
   36: -define(SNMP_USE_V3, true).
   37: -include_lib("snmp/include/snmp_types.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   39: 
   40: 
   41: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: %% External exports
   43: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: -export([
   45:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   46:          init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
   47:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2, 
   48:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   49: 
   50: 	 open_and_close/1,
   51: 	
   52: 	 open_write_and_close1/1,
   53: 	 open_write_and_close2/1,
   54: 	 open_write_and_close3/1,
   55: 	 open_write_and_close4/1,
   56: 	
   57: 	 log_to_io1/1,
   58: 	 log_to_io2/1,
   59: 	
   60: 	 log_to_txt1/1,
   61:   	 log_to_txt2/1,
   62:   	 log_to_txt3/1
   63: 	]).
   64: 
   65: 
   66: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Internal exports
   68: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: -export([
   70: 	 log_writer_main/6,
   71: 	 log_reader_main/1,
   72: 	 next_seqno/2
   73:         ]).
   74: 
   75: 
   76: %%======================================================================
   77: %% Common Test interface functions
   78: %%======================================================================
   79: 
   80: suite() -> 
   81:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   82: 
   83: all() -> 
   84:     [
   85:      open_and_close, 
   86:      {group, open_write_and_close},
   87:      {group, log_to_io}, 
   88:      {group, log_to_txt}].
   89: 
   90: groups() -> 
   91:     [
   92:      {open_write_and_close, [], owac_cases()},
   93:      {log_to_io,            [], l2i_cases()},
   94:      {log_to_txt,           [], l2t_cases()}
   95:     ].
   96: 
   97: 
   98: owac_cases() ->
   99:     [
  100:      open_write_and_close1,
  101:      open_write_and_close2,
  102:      open_write_and_close3,
  103:      open_write_and_close4
  104:     ].
  105: 
  106: l2i_cases() ->
  107:     [
  108:      log_to_io1,
  109:      log_to_io2
  110:     ].
  111: 
  112: l2t_cases() ->
  113:     [
  114:      log_to_txt1,
  115:      log_to_txt2,
  116:      log_to_txt3
  117:     ].
  118: 
  119: 
  120: 
  121: %%
  122: %% -----
  123: %%
  124: 
  125: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  126:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  127:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  128:             SKIP;
  129: 
  130:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  131:             snmp_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  132:             Config1
  133:     end.
  134: 
  135: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  136:     snmp_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  137:     ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config).
  138: 
  139: 
  140: 
  141: %%
  142: %% -----
  143: %%
  144: 
  145: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  146:     Config.
  147: 
  148: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  149:     Config.
  150: 
  151: 
  152: 
  153: %%
  154: %% -----
  155: %%
  156: 
  157: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158: 
  159:     snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  160:     
  161:     Dir        = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  162:     LogTestDir = join(Dir,        ?MODULE),
  163:     CaseDir    = join(LogTestDir, Case),
  164:     case file:make_dir(LogTestDir) of
  165: 	ok ->
  166: 	    ok;
  167: 	{error, eexist} ->
  168: 	    ok;
  169: 	Error ->
  170: 	    ?FAIL({failed_creating_subsuite_top_dir, Error})
  171:     end,
  172:     ok = file:make_dir(CaseDir),
  173:     Dog = ?WD_START(?MINS(5)),
  174:     [{log_dir, CaseDir}, {watchdog, Dog}|Config].
  175: 
  176: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177: 
  178:     ?IPRINT("system events during test: "
  179:             "~n   ~p", [snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  180: 
  181:     %% Leave the dirs created above (enable debugging of the test case(s))
  182:     Dog = ?config(watchdog, Config),
  183:     ?WD_STOP(Dog),
  184:     lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config).
  185: 
  186: 
  187: 
  188: %%======================================================================
  189: %% Test functions
  190: %%======================================================================
  191: 
  192: open_and_close(suite) -> [];
  193: open_and_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  194:     ?P(open_and_close),
  195:     put(sname,open_and_close),
  196:     put(verbosity,trace),
  197:     Dir    = ?config(log_dir, Config),
  198:     Name   = "snmp_test",
  199:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test.log"),
  200:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  201:     Repair = true,
  202:     {ok, Log} = snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair),
  203:     ok = snmp_log:sync(Log),
  204:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  205:     display_info(Info),
  206:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log).
  207:     
  208: 
  209: %%======================================================================
  210: 
  211: open_write_and_close1(suite) -> 
  212:     [];
  213: open_write_and_close1(doc) -> 
  214:     "Open a plain (no sequence-numbering) log file";
  215: open_write_and_close1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  216:     ?P(open_write_and_close1),
  217:     put(sname,open_write_and_close1),
  218:     put(verbosity,trace),
  219:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> start", []),
  220: 
  221:     SeqNoGen = none, 
  222:     ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Config),
  223: 
  224:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> done", []),
  225:     ok.
  226:     
  227: 
  228: %%======================================================================
  229: 
  230: open_write_and_close2(suite) -> 
  231:     [];
  232: open_write_and_close2(doc) -> 
  233:     "Open a log file with sequence-numbering explicitly disabled";
  234: open_write_and_close2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     ?P(open_write_and_close2),
  236:     put(sname,open_write_and_close2),
  237:     put(verbosity,trace),
  238:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close2 -> start", []),
  239: 
  240:     SeqNoGen = disabled, 
  241:     ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Config),
  242: 
  243:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close2 -> done", []),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: 
  247: %%======================================================================
  248: 
  249: open_write_and_close3(suite) -> 
  250:     [];
  251: open_write_and_close3(doc) -> 
  252:     "Open a log file with sequence-numbering using MFA";
  253: open_write_and_close3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  254:     ?P(open_write_and_close3),
  255:     put(sname,open_write_and_close3),
  256:     put(verbosity,trace),
  257:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close2 -> start", []),
  258: 
  259:     seqno_init(), 
  260:     SeqNoGen = {?MODULE, next_seqno, [10, 100]}, 
  261:     ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Config),
  262:     seqno_finish(),
  263: 
  264:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close2 -> done", []),
  265:     ok.
  266: 
  267: 
  268: %%======================================================================
  269: 
  270: open_write_and_close4(suite) -> 
  271:     [];
  272: open_write_and_close4(doc) -> 
  273:     "Open a log file with sequence-numbering using fun";
  274: open_write_and_close4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  275:     ?P(open_write_and_close4),
  276:     put(sname,open_write_and_close4),
  277:     put(verbosity,trace),
  278:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close2 -> start", []),
  279: 
  280:     seqno_init(), 
  281:     SeqNoGen = fun() -> next_seqno(10, 100) end, 
  282:     ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Config),
  283:     seqno_finish(),
  284: 
  285:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close2 -> done", []),
  286:     ok.
  287: 
  288: 
  289: %%======================================================================
  290: 
  291: seqno_init() ->
  292:     ets:new(snmp_log_test_seqno_tab, [named_table, set, protected]).
  293: 
  294: seqno_finish() ->
  295:     ets:delete(snmp_log_test_seqno_tab).
  296: 
  297: next_seqno(Initial, Max) ->
  298:     Key       = seqno, 
  299:     Position  = 2, 
  300:     Increment = 1, 
  301:     Threshold = Max,
  302:     SetValue  = Initial, 
  303:     UpdateOp  = {Position, Increment, Threshold, SetValue},
  304:     Tab       = snmp_log_test_seqno_tab, 
  305:     case (catch ets:update_counter(Tab, Key, UpdateOp)) of
  306: 	{'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
  307: 	    ets:insert(Tab, {seqno, Initial}),
  308: 	    Initial;
  309: 	Next when is_integer(Next) ->
  310: 	    Next
  311:     end.
  312:     
  313: open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Config) ->
  314:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> start", []),
  315:     Dir    = ?config(log_dir, Config),
  316:     Name   = "snmp_test",
  317:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test.log"),
  318:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  319:     Repair = true,
  320:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close -> create log", []),
  321:     
  322:     {ok, Log} =
  323: 	case SeqNoGen of
  324: 	    none -> 
  325: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair);
  326: 	    _ ->
  327: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, SeqNoGen, Size, Repair)
  328: 	end,
  329: 
  330:     Vsn       = 'version-2',
  331:     Community = "all-rights",
  332: 
  333:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> create messages to log", []),
  334:     %% A request
  335:     Req = get_next_request(Vsn, Community, [1,1], 1, 235779012),
  336: 
  337:     %% A reply
  338:     Rep = get_response(Vsn, Community,
  339: 			     [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 'OCTET STRING',
  340: 			     "Erlang SNMP agent", 1, 235779012),
  341:     
  342:     %% Create a list of messages to log:
  343:     Msgs = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(1002,[Req,Rep])),
  344: 
  345:     %% And now log them:
  346:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> log ~p messages, ~p bytes", 
  347: 	[length(Msgs), size(list_to_binary(Msgs))]),
  348:     Addr = ?LOCALHOST(),
  349:     Port = 162,
  350:     Logger = fun(Packet) ->
  351: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  352: 	     end,
  353:     lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  354:     check_notify(),
  355:     
  356:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> display info", []),
  357:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  358:     display_info(Info),
  359: 
  360:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> close log", []),
  361:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  362: 
  363:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close -> done", []),
  364:     ok.
  365:     
  366: 
  367: 
  368: %%======================================================================
  369: 
  370: log_to_io1(suite) -> [];
  371: log_to_io1(doc) -> "Log to io from the same process that opened "
  372: 		       "and wrote the log";
  373: log_to_io1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  374:     ?P(log_to_io1),
  375:     put(sname,l2i1),
  376:     put(verbosity,debug),
  377:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> start", []),
  378:     Dir    = ?config(log_dir, Config),
  379:     Name   = "snmp_test_l2i1",
  380:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2i1.log"),
  381:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  382:     Repair = true,
  383:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> create log", []),
  384:     {ok, Log} = snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair),
  385: 
  386:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> create messages to log", []),
  387:     Msgs = messages(),
  388: 
  389:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> create logger funs", []),
  390:     Addr = ?LOCALHOST(),
  391:     Port = 162,
  392:     Logger = fun(Packet) ->
  393: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  394: 	     end,
  395:     BatchLogger = fun(Time) ->
  396: 			  lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  397: 			  ?SLEEP(Time),
  398: 			  ok
  399: 		  end,
  400:     To = lists:duplicate(100, 100),
  401: 
  402:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> log the messages", []),
  403:     lists:foreach(BatchLogger, To),
  404: 
  405:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> display info", []),
  406:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  407:     display_info(Info),
  408: 
  409:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> do the convert to io (stdout)", []),
  410:     ? line ok = snmp:log_to_io(Dir, [], Name, File, false),
  411: 
  412:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> close log", []),
  413:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  414: 
  415:     ?DBG("log_to_io1 -> done", []),
  416:     ok.
  417: 
  418: 
  419: %%======================================================================
  420: %% Start a logger-process that logs messages with a certain interval.
  421: %% Start a reader-process that reads messages from the log at a certain
  422: %% point in time.
  423: 
  424: log_to_io2(suite) -> [];
  425: log_to_io2(doc) -> "Log to io from a different process than which "
  426: 		       "opened and wrote the log";
  427: log_to_io2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  428:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  429:     ?P(log_to_io2),
  430:     put(sname, l2i2),
  431:     put(verbosity,debug),
  432:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> start", []),
  433:     Dir    = ?config(log_dir, Config),
  434:     Factor = ?config(snmp_factor, Config),
  435:     Name   = "snmp_test_l2i2",
  436:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2i2.log"),
  437:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  438:     Repair = true,
  439:     
  440:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> create log writer process", []),
  441:     {ok, Log, Logger} =
  442:         log_writer_start(Name, File, Size, Repair, Factor),
  443: 
  444:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> create log reader process", []),
  445:     {ok, Reader} = log_reader_start(),
  446: 
  447:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> wait some time", []),
  448:     ?SLEEP(5000),
  449: 
  450:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> display log info", []),
  451:     log_writer_info(Logger),
  452: 
  453:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> instruct the log writer to sleep some", []),
  454:     ok = log_writer_sleep(Logger, 5000),
  455: 
  456:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> instruct the log reader to log to io", []),
  457:     Res = 
  458: 	log_reader_log_to(Reader, 
  459: 			  fun() -> 
  460: 				  I = disk_log:info(Log),
  461: 				  R = snmp:log_to_io(Dir, [], Name, File, true),
  462: 				  {R, I}
  463: 			  end),
  464: 
  465:     case Res of
  466: 	{ok, _Info} ->
  467: 	    ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> ~n   Info: ~p", [_Info]),
  468: 	    ok;
  469: 	{Error, Info} ->
  470: 	    ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> log to io failed: "
  471: 		 "~n   Error: ~p"
  472: 		 "~n   Info:  ~p", [Error, Info]),
  473: 	    ?FAIL({log_lo_io_failed, Error, Info})
  474:     end,
  475: 
  476:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> instruct the log writer to stop", []),
  477:     log_writer_stop(Logger),
  478: 
  479:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> instruct the log reader to stop", []),
  480:     log_reader_stop(Reader),
  481: 
  482:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> done", []),
  483:     ok.
  484: 
  485: 
  486: %%======================================================================
  487: 
  488: log_to_txt1(suite) -> [];
  489: log_to_txt1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  490:     ?P(log_to_txt1),
  491:     put(sname,l2t1),
  492:     put(verbosity,debug),
  493:     ?DBG("log_to_txt1 -> start", []),
  494: 
  495:     Name     = "snmp_test_l2t1",
  496:     SeqNoGen = disabled, 
  497:     ok = log_to_txt(Name, SeqNoGen, Config),
  498: 
  499:     ?DBG("log_to_txt1 -> done", []),
  500:     ok.
  501: 
  502: 
  503: 
  504: %%======================================================================
  505: 
  506: log_to_txt2(suite) -> [];
  507: log_to_txt2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  508:     ?P(log_to_txt2),
  509:     put(sname,l2t2),
  510:     put(verbosity,debug),
  511:     ?DBG("log_to_txt2 -> start", []),
  512: 
  513:     Name     = "snmp_test_l2t2",
  514:     seqno_init(), 
  515:     SeqNoGen = {?MODULE, next_seqno, [1, 100]}, 
  516:     ok = log_to_txt(Name, SeqNoGen, Config),
  517:     seqno_finish(),
  518: 
  519:     ?DBG("log_to_txt2 -> done", []),
  520:     ok.
  521: 
  522: 
  523: 
  524: %%======================================================================
  525: 
  526: log_to_txt(Name, SeqNoGen, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  527:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> entry", []),
  528:     Dir    = ?config(log_dir, Config),
  529:     File   = join(Dir, Name ++ ".log"),
  530:     Size   = {10240, 10},
  531:     Repair = true,
  532: 
  533:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> create log", []),
  534:     {ok, Log} =
  535: 	case SeqNoGen of
  536: 	    none -> 
  537: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair);
  538: 	    _ ->
  539: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, SeqNoGen, Size, Repair)
  540: 	end,
  541: 
  542:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> create messages to log", []),
  543:     Msgs = messages(),
  544: 
  545:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> create logger funs", []),
  546:     Addr = ?LOCALHOST(),
  547:     Port = 162,
  548:     Logger = fun(Packet) ->
  549: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  550: 	     end,
  551:     BatchLogger = fun(Time) ->
  552: 			  lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  553: 			  ?SLEEP(Time),
  554: 			  ok
  555: 		  end,
  556:     To = lists:duplicate(10, 5000),
  557: 
  558:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> log the messages", []),
  559:     Start = calendar:local_time(),
  560:     lists:foreach(BatchLogger, To),
  561:     Stop  = calendar:local_time(),
  562: 
  563:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> display info", []),
  564:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  565:     display_info(Info),
  566: 
  567:     Out1a = join(Dir, "snmp_text-1-unblocked.txt"),
  568:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> do the convert to a text file (~s) unblocked", [Out1a]),
  569:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out1a, Log, File, false),
  570: 
  571:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size1a}} = file:read_file_info(Out1a),
  572:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> text file size: ~p", [Size1a]),
  573:     validate_size(Size1a),
  574: 
  575:     Out1b = join(Dir, "snmp_text-1-blocked.txt"),
  576:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> do the convert to a text file (~s) blocked", [Out1b]),
  577:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out1b, Log, File, true),
  578: 
  579:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size1b}} = file:read_file_info(Out1b),
  580:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> text file size: ~p", [Size1b]),
  581:     validate_size(Size1b, {eq, Size1a}),
  582: 
  583:     Out2 = join(Dir, "snmp_text-2.txt"),
  584:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> do the convert to a text file when"
  585: 	"~n   Start: ~p"
  586: 	"~n   Stop:  ~p"
  587: 	"~n   Out2:  ~p", [Start, Stop, Out2]),
  588:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out2, Log, File, Start, Stop),
  589: 
  590:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size2}} = file:read_file_info(Out2),
  591:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> text file size: ~p", [Size2]),
  592:     validate_size(Size2, {le, Size1a}),
  593: 
  594:     %% Calculate new start / stop times...
  595:     GStart = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(Start),
  596:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> GStart: ~p", [GStart]),
  597:     GStop  = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(Stop),
  598:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> GStop: ~p", [GStop]),
  599:     Diff4 = (GStop - GStart) div 4,
  600:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> Diff4: ~p", [Diff4]),
  601:     GStart2 = GStart + Diff4,
  602:     GStop2  = GStop - Diff4,
  603:     if 
  604: 	GStop2 > GStart2 ->
  605: 	    ok;
  606: 	true ->
  607: 	    ?FAIL({date_calc_failure, GStart2, GStop2})
  608:     end,
  609:     
  610:     Start2 = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(GStart2),
  611:     Stop2  = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(GStop2),
  612:     
  613:     Out3 = join(Dir, "snmp_text-3.txt"),
  614:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> do the convert to a text file when"
  615: 	"~n   Start2: ~p"
  616: 	"~n   Stop2:  ~p"
  617: 	"~n   Out3:   ~p", [Start2, Stop2, Out3]),
  618:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out3, Log, File, Start2, Stop2),
  619: 
  620:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size3}} = file:read_file_info(Out3),
  621:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> text file size: ~p", [Size3]),
  622:     validate_size(Size3, {l, Size1a}),    
  623: 
  624:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> close log", []),
  625:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  626: 
  627:     ?DBG("log_to_txt -> done", []),
  628:     ok.
  629: 
  630: 
  631: %%======================================================================
  632: %% Start a logger-process that logs messages with a certain interval.
  633: %% Start a reader-process that reads messages from the log at a certain
  634: %% point of time.
  635: %%
  636: %% Test: ts:run(snmp, snmp_log_test, log_to_txt2, [batch]).
  637: 
  638: log_to_txt3(suite) -> 
  639:     [];
  640: log_to_txt3(doc) -> 
  641:     "Log to txt file from a different process than which "
  642: 	"opened and wrote the log";
  643: log_to_txt3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  644:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  645:     ?P(log_to_txt3),
  646:     put(sname,l2t3),
  647:     put(verbosity,debug),
  648:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> start", []),
  649:     Dir     = ?config(log_dir, Config),
  650:     Factor  = ?config(snmp_factor, Config),
  651:     Name    = "snmp_test_l2t3",
  652:     LogFile = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2t3.log"),
  653:     TxtFile = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2t3.txt"),
  654:     Meg     = 1024*1024,
  655:     Size    = {10*Meg, 10},
  656:     Repair  = true,
  657: 
  658:     StdMibDir = filename:join(code:priv_dir(snmp), "mibs") ++ "/",
  659:     Mibs = [join(StdMibDir, "SNMPv2-MIB")],
  660: 
  661:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> create log writer process", []),
  662:     {ok, Log, Logger} =
  663:         log_writer_start(Name, LogFile, Size, Repair, Factor),
  664: 
  665:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> create log reader process", []),
  666:     {ok, Reader} = log_reader_start(),
  667: 
  668:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> wait some time", []),
  669:     ?SLEEP(5000),
  670: 
  671:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> display log info", []),
  672:     log_writer_info(Logger),
  673: 
  674:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> instruct the log writer to sleep some", []),
  675:     ok = log_writer_sleep(Logger, 5000),
  676: 
  677:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> instruct the log reader to log to txt", []),
  678:     Res = 
  679: 	log_reader_log_to(Reader, 
  680: 			  fun() -> 
  681: 				  I = disk_log:info(Log),
  682: 				  T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  683: 				  R = snmp_log:log_to_txt(Log, LogFile, Dir, 
  684: 							  Mibs, TxtFile),
  685: 				  T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  686: 				  ?IPRINT("Time converting file: ~w ms", [T2 - T1]),
  687: 				  {R, I}
  688: 			  end),
  689: 
  690:     case Res of
  691: 	{ok, _Info} ->
  692: 	    ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> ~n   Info: ~p", [_Info]),
  693: 	    {ok, #file_info{size = FileSize}} =
  694: 		file:read_file_info(TxtFile),
  695: 	    ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> text file size: ~p", [FileSize]),
  696: 	    validate_size(FileSize);
  697: 	{Error, Info} ->
  698: 	    ?EPRINT("log to txt failed: "
  699:                     "~n   Error: ~p"
  700:                     "~n   Info:  ~p", [Error, Info]),
  701: 	    ?FAIL({log_lo_txt_failed, Error, Info})
  702:     end,
  703: 
  704:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> instruct the log writer to stop", []),
  705:     log_writer_stop(Logger),
  706: 
  707:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> instruct the log reader to stop", []),
  708:     log_reader_stop(Reader),
  709: 
  710:     ?IPRINT("log_to_txt3 -> done", []),
  711:     ok.
  712: 
  713: 
  714: validate_size(0) ->
  715:     ?FAIL(invalid_size);
  716: validate_size(_) ->
  717:     ok.
  718: 
  719: validate_size(0, _) ->
  720:     ?FAIL(invalid_size);
  721: validate_size(A, {eq, A}) ->
  722:     ok;
  723: validate_size(A, {le, B}) when A =< B ->
  724:     ok;
  725: validate_size(A, {l, B}) when A < B ->
  726:     ok;
  727: validate_size(A, B) ->
  728:     ?FAIL({invalid_size, A, B}).
  729: 
  730:     
  731: %%======================================================================
  732: %% Internal functions
  733: %%======================================================================
  734: 
  735: log_writer_start(Name, File, Size, Repair, Factor) ->
  736:     {Pid, _} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, log_writer_main, 
  737: 		             [Name, File, Size, Repair, self(), Factor]),
  738:     receive
  739: 	{log, Log, Pid} ->
  740: 	    {ok, Log, Pid};
  741: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  742: 	    {error, Reason}
  743:     after 30000 ->
  744: 	    Msg  = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  745: 	    Info = (catch process_info(Pid)),
  746: 	    exit({failed_starting_writer, timeout, Msg, Info})
  747:     end.
  748: 
  749: log_writer_stop(Pid) ->
  750:     Pid ! {stop, self()},
  751:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  752:     receive
  753: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
  754: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  755: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to stop the writer", [_T2 - _T1]),
  756: 	    ok
  757:     after 60000 ->
  758: 	    Msg  = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  759: 	    Info = (catch process_info(Pid)),
  760: 	    ?IPRINT("failed stop writer - kill it: "
  761: 	    	    "~n      Msg:  ~p"
  762: 	    	    "~n      Info: ~p", [Msg, Info]),
  763: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
  764: 	    ok
  765:     end.
  766: 
  767: log_writer_info(Pid) ->
  768:     Pid ! {info, self()}.
  769: 
  770: log_writer_sleep(Pid, Time) ->
  771:     Pid ! {sleep, Time, self()},
  772:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  773:     receive 
  774: 	{sleeping, Pid} ->
  775: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  776: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to put the writer to sleep", [_T2 - _T1]),
  777: 	    ok;
  778: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  779: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  780: 	    ?IPRINT("writer error while attempting to put it to sleep (~w): "
  781: 	            "~n      ~p", [_T2 - _T1, Reason]),
  782: 	    {error, Reason}
  783:     after 60000 ->
  784: 	    Msg  = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  785: 	    Info = (catch process_info(Pid)),
  786: 	    ?IPRINT("failed to put writer to sleep - kill it"),
  787: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
  788: 	    exit({failed_put_writer_to_sleep, timeout, Msg, Info})
  789:     end.
  790: 
  791: log_writer_main(Name, File, Size, Repair, P, Factor) ->
  792:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  793:     put(tname, "LOG-WRITER"),
  794:     {ok, Log} = snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair),
  795:     P ! {log, Log, self()},
  796:     Msgs   = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(if 
  797:                                                (Factor > 10) -> 1;
  798:                                                true   -> 10 div Factor
  799:                                            end,
  800:                                            messages())),
  801:     Addr   = ?LOCALHOST(),
  802:     Port   = 162,
  803:     Logger =  fun(Packet) ->
  804: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  805: 	      end,
  806:     BatchLogger = fun(Time) ->
  807: 			  lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  808: 			  ?SLEEP(Time),
  809: 			  ok
  810: 		  end,
  811:     log_writer(Log, BatchLogger, P).
  812: 
  813: log_writer(Log, Fun, P) ->
  814:     ?IPRINT("entry"),
  815:     receive 
  816: 	{stop, P} ->
  817: 	    ?IPRINT("received stop request"),
  818: 	    ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  819: 	    exit(normal);
  820: 	{info, P} ->
  821: 	    ?IPRINT("received info request"),
  822: 	    {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  823: 	    display_info(Info),
  824: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P);
  825: 	{sleep, Time, P} ->
  826: 	    ?IPRINT("received sleep (~w) request", [Time]),
  827: 	    P ! {sleeping, self()},
  828: 	    ?SLEEP(Time),
  829: 	    ?IPRINT("done sleeping"),
  830: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P);
  831: 	ELSE ->
  832: 	    ?EPRINT("Received unknown message: "
  833:                     "~n   ~p", [ELSE]),
  834: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P)
  835:     after 1000 ->
  836: 	    ?IPRINT("log some messages"),
  837: 	    To = lists:duplicate(100, 100),
  838: 	    lists:foreach(Fun, To),
  839: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P)
  840:     end.
  841: 
  842: 
  843: %% --
  844: 
  845: log_reader_start() ->
  846:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, log_reader_main, [self()]),
  847:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  848:     receive 
  849: 	{started, Pid} ->
  850: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  851: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to start the reader", [_T2 - _T1]),
  852: 	    {ok, Pid};
  853: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  854: 	    {error, Reason}
  855:     after 1000 ->
  856: 	    error
  857:     end.
  858: 
  859: log_reader_stop(Pid) ->
  860:     Pid ! {stop, self()},
  861:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  862:     receive
  863: 	{'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
  864: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  865: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to stop the reader", [_T2 - _T1]),
  866: 	    ok
  867:     after 1000 ->
  868: 	    Msg = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  869: 	    exit({failed_stopping_reader, timeout, Msg})
  870:     end.
  871: 
  872: log_reader_log_to(Pid, LogToFun) when is_function(LogToFun) ->
  873:     Pid ! {log_to, LogToFun, self()},
  874:     receive
  875: 	{log_to_reply, Res, Pid} ->
  876: 	    Res
  877:     end.
  878: 
  879: log_reader_main(P) ->
  880:     put(tname, "LOG-READER"),
  881:     P ! {started, self()},
  882:     log_reader(P).
  883: 
  884: log_reader(P) ->
  885:     ?IPRINT("entry"),
  886:     receive 
  887: 	{stop, P} ->
  888: 	    ?IPRINT("received stop request"),
  889: 	    exit(normal);
  890: 	{log_to, F, P} ->
  891: 	    ?IPRINT("received log_to request"),
  892: 	    Res = F(),
  893: 	    ?IPRINT("done with log_to - sending reply"),
  894: 	    P ! {log_to_reply, Res, self()}, 
  895: 	    log_reader(P);
  896: 	ELSE ->
  897: 	    ?EPRINT("Received unknown message: "
  898:                     "~n   ~p", [ELSE]),
  899: 	    log_reader(P)
  900:     end.
  901:     
  902: 
  903: %%======================================================================
  904: 
  905: check_notify() ->
  906:     receive
  907: 	{disk_log, Node, LogName, Info} ->
  908: 	    io:format("disk_log notify: "
  909: 		      "~n   Node:    ~p"
  910: 		      "~n   LogName: ~s"
  911: 		      "~n   Info:    ~p"
  912: 		      "~n", [Node, LogName, Info]),
  913: 	    check_notify()
  914:     after 1000 ->
  915: 	    done
  916:     end.
  917: 
  918: 
  919: messages() ->
  920:     [get_next_request('version-1', "all-rights", 
  921: 		      [1,13], 1, 1101),
  922:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
  923: 		  [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 
  924: 		  'OCTET STRING', "Erlang SNMP agent",
  925: 		  1, 1101),
  926:      get_request('version-1', "all-rights", 
  927: 		 [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 1, 1102),
  928:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
  929: 		  [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 
  930: 		  'OCTET STRING', "Erlang SNMP agent",
  931: 		  1, 1102),
  932:      set_request('version-1', "all-rights", 
  933: 		 [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,6,0], 
  934: 		 'OCTET STRING', "new_value",
  935: 		 1, 1003),
  936:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
  937: 		  [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,6,0], 
  938: 		  'OCTET STRING', "new_value",
  939: 		  1, 1103),
  940:      get_bulk_request("all-rights", 1104),
  941:      bulk_get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
  942: 		       [48,29,6,8,43,6,1,2,1,1,1,0,4,17,69,114,108,97,
  943: 			110,103,32,83,78,77,80,32,97,103,101,110,116,
  944: 			48,7,6,3,43,7,1,130,0], 1104),
  945:      inform_request("all-rights", 1105),
  946:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
  947: 		  [{[1,3,6,1,2,1,1,3,0],
  948: 		    'TimeTicks',
  949: 		    4046,
  950: 		    1},
  951: 		   {[1,3,6,1,6,3,1,1,4,1,0],
  952: 		    'OBJECT IDENTIFIER',
  953: 		    [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,0,1],2}],
  954: 		  1105),
  955:      snmpv2_trap("all-rights", 1106),
  956:      trap("all-rights")].
  957: 
  958: 
  959: get_request(Vsn, Community, Oid, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
  960:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
  961: 		       variabletype = 'NULL',
  962: 		       value        = 'NULL',
  963: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
  964:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
  965: 		   request_id   = ReqId, 
  966: 		   error_status = noError, 
  967: 		   error_index  = 0,
  968: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
  969:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
  970: 
  971: get_next_request(Vsn, Community, Oid, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
  972:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
  973: 		       variabletype = 'NULL',
  974: 		       value        = 'NULL',
  975: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
  976:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-next-request',
  977: 		   request_id   = ReqId, 
  978: 		   error_status = noError, 
  979: 		   error_index  = 0,
  980: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
  981:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
  982: 
  983: bulk_get_response(Vsn, Community, Bulk, ReqId) ->
  984:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
  985: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
  986: 		   error_status = noError,
  987: 		   error_index  = 0,
  988: 		   varbinds     = Bulk},
  989:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
  990:     
  991: get_response(Vsn, Community, VarbindData, ReqId) ->
  992:     Varbinds = varbinds(VarbindData, []),
  993:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
  994: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
  995: 		   error_status = noError,
  996: 		   error_index  = 0,
  997: 		   varbinds     = Varbinds},
  998:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
  999:     
 1000: get_response(Vsn, Community, Oid, Type, Value, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
 1001:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1002: 		       variabletype = Type,
 1003: 		       value        = Value,
 1004: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1005:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
 1006: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
 1007: 		   error_status = noError,
 1008: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1009: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1010:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1011: 
 1012: set_request(Vsn, Community, Oid, Type, Value, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
 1013:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1014: 		       variabletype = Type,
 1015: 		       value        = Value,
 1016: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1017:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'set-request',
 1018: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
 1019: 		   error_status = noError,
 1020: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1021: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1022:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1023: 
 1024: 
 1025: get_bulk_request(Community, ReqId) ->
 1026:     Varbinds = [#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1],
 1027: 			 variabletype = 'NULL',
 1028: 			 value        = 'NULL',
 1029: 			 org_index    = 1},
 1030: 		#varbind{oid          = [1,3,7,1],
 1031: 			 variabletype = 'NULL',
 1032: 			 value        = 'NULL',
 1033: 			 org_index    = 2}],
 1034:     Pdu = #pdu{type         = 'get-bulk-request',
 1035: 	       request_id   = ReqId,
 1036: 	       error_status = 1,
 1037: 	       error_index  = 1,
 1038: 	       varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1039:     enc_message('version-2', Community, Pdu).
 1040: 
 1041: inform_request(Community, ReqId) ->
 1042:     Varbinds = [#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,3,0],
 1043: 			 variabletype = 'TimeTicks',
 1044: 			 value        = 4046,
 1045: 			 org_index    = 1},
 1046: 		#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,6,3,1,1,4,1,0],
 1047: 			 variabletype = 'OBJECT IDENTIFIER',
 1048: 			 value        = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,0,1],
 1049: 			 org_index    = 2}],
 1050:     Pdu = #pdu{type         = 'inform-request',
 1051: 	       request_id   = ReqId,
 1052: 	       error_status = noError,
 1053: 	       error_index  = 0,
 1054: 	       varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1055:     enc_message('version-2', Community, Pdu).
 1056: 
 1057: snmpv2_trap(Community, ReqId) ->
 1058:     Varbinds = [#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,3,0],
 1059: 			 variabletype = 'TimeTicks',
 1060: 			 value        = 3945,
 1061: 			 org_index    = 1},
 1062: 		#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,6,3,1,1,4,1,0],
 1063: 			 variabletype = 'OBJECT IDENTIFIER',
 1064: 			 value        = [1,3,6,1,2,1,11,1],
 1065: 			 org_index    = 2}],
 1066:     Pdu = #pdu{type         = 'snmpv2-trap',
 1067: 	       request_id   = ReqId,
 1068: 	       error_status = noError,
 1069: 	       error_index  = 0,
 1070: 	       varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1071:     enc_message('version-2', Community, Pdu).
 1072: 
 1073: % report() ->
 1074: %     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = ?snmpUnknownPDUHandlers,
 1075: % 		       variabletype = 'Counter32',
 1076: % 		       value        = 111},
 1077: %     Pdu = #pdu{type         = report, 
 1078: % 	       request_id   = 991199,
 1079: % 	       error_status = noError, 
 1080: % 	       error_index  = 0,
 1081: % 	       varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1082: %     enc_message('version-3', Community, Pdu).
 1083: 
 1084: trap(Community) ->
 1085:     Enterp    = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1],
 1086:     Oid       = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,4,0],
 1087:     Type      = 'OCTET STRING',
 1088:     Value     = "{mbj,eklas}@erlang.ericsson.se",
 1089:     SysUpTime = 4379, 
 1090:     Spec      = 1,
 1091:     Generic   = 6, 
 1092:     AgentIp   = [127,0,0,1],
 1093:     trap(Community, Enterp, Oid, Type, Value, SysUpTime, 
 1094: 	 Spec, Generic, AgentIp, 1).
 1095: 
 1096: %% V1 trap
 1097: trap(Community, Enterp, Oid, Type, Value, SysUpTime, 
 1098:      Spec, Generic, AgentIp, OrgIdx) ->
 1099:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1100: 		       variabletype = Type, 
 1101: 		       value        = Value,
 1102: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1103:     Trap = #trappdu{enterprise    = Enterp,
 1104: 		    agent_addr    = AgentIp,
 1105: 		    generic_trap  = Generic,
 1106: 		    specific_trap = Spec,
 1107: 		    time_stamp    = SysUpTime,
 1108: 		    varbinds      = [Varbind]},
 1109:     enc_message('version-1', Community, Trap).
 1110: 
 1111: varbinds([], Varbinds) ->
 1112:     lists:reverse(Varbinds);
 1113: varbinds([{Oid, Type, Value, Idx}|T], Acc) ->
 1114:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1115: 		       variabletype = Type, 
 1116: 		       value        = Value,
 1117: 		       org_index    = Idx},
 1118:     varbinds(T, [Varbind|Acc]).
 1119: 
 1120: enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu) ->
 1121:     PduBytes = snmp_pdus:enc_pdu(Pdu),
 1122:     Msg      = #message{version = Vsn,
 1123: 			vsn_hdr = Community,
 1124: 			data    = PduBytes},
 1125:     list_to_binary(snmp_pdus:enc_message_only(Msg)).
 1126: 
 1127: display_info(Info) ->
 1128:     {SinceOpened, SinceLastInfo} = get_info(no_overflows, Info, {-1,-1}),
 1129:     CurrentFile = get_info(current_file, Info, -1),
 1130:     NoItems = get_info(no_current_items, Info, -1),
 1131:     NoBytes = get_info(no_current_bytes, Info, -1),
 1132:     ?NPRINT("Disk log info: "
 1133:             "~n   Number of filled since opened:    ~p"
 1134:             "~n   Number of filled since last info: ~p"
 1135:             "~n   Current file:                     ~p"
 1136:             "~n   Number of items in file:          ~p"
 1137:             "~n   Number of bytes in file:          ~p", 
 1138:             [SinceOpened, SinceLastInfo, CurrentFile, NoItems, NoBytes]).
 1139: 
 1140: get_info(Key, Info, Def) ->
 1141:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Info) of
 1142: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
 1143: 	    Val;
 1144: 	false ->
 1145: 	    Def
 1146:     end.
 1147: 
 1148: join(D, F) ->
 1149:     filename:join(D, F).
 1150:
